scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n buttercal -o build/buttercal-date.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/buttercal-date.js -c -m -o build/buttercal-date.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/buttercal-date.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/buttercal-date.js build/buttercal-date.min.js
